GapFillInput.Title: Comparative adjectives
GapFillInput.Instruction: Read the film reviews. Then put the adjective in brackets into the comparative form. Type the answers in each gap.

P.FONT: This new horror film from Leo Travis is violent and very frightening. It stars Sean Taylor as a man who dies, becomes a zombie and kills all his friends, one by one. The acting isn’t great but the story is fast and exciting. Don’t miss this exciting film. Recommended.

Catherine * A historical film about Catherine the Great, Empress of Russia. The acting, from Lisa Wale and Jaye Sewell is terrible and the love story is silly and not very romantic. The action is boring, slow and sometimes violent. Not recommended.

The Four of Us **** An enjoyable romantic comedy, starring Hugh Crane and Melissa Ling. It’s a story of four friends and their lives after college. The actors are great and the story is sometimes funny, and sometimes sad. Go and see it. Highly recommended.
